verses.text: O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* me not in thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, neither \w chasten|strong="H3256"\w* me in thy hot \w displeasure|strong="H2534"\w*.\f + \fr 6.1 \ft chief…: or, overseer\f*\f + \fr 6.1 \ft Sheminith: or, the eighth\f*

Have \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* upon me, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; for I \add am\add* \w weak|strong="H0536"\w*: O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* me; for my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* are \w vexed|strong="H0926"\w*.
My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* is also \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w vexed|strong="H0926"\w*: but thou, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, how long?

\w Return|strong="H7725"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w deliver|strong="H2502"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: oh \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me for thy \w mercies’|strong="H2617"\w* sake.
For in \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \add there is\add* no \w remembrance|strong="H2143"\w* of thee: in the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w* who shall give thee \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w*?

I am \w weary|strong="H3021"\w* with my \w groaning|strong="H0585"\w*; all the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* make I my \w bed|strong="H4296"\w* to \w swim|strong="H7811"\w*; I \w water|strong="H4529"\w* my \w couch|strong="H6210"\w* with my \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*.\f + \fr 6.6 \ft all…: or, every night\f*
Mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* is \w consumed|strong="H6244"\w* because of \w grief|strong="H3708"\w*; it waxeth \w old|strong="H6275"\w* because of all mine \w enemies|strong="H6887"\w*.

\w Depart|strong="H5493"\w* from me, all ye \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of my \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* my \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w*; the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*.

Let all mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* and \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w vexed|strong="H0926"\w*: let them \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \add and\add* be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H7281"\w*.
